summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Section 22.400.010 of the Seattle Municipal Code to adopt the 1985 edition of the Uniform Mechanical Code, which together with the amendments adopted by Ordinance 113703 shall constitute the Seattle Mechanical Code; amending Section 6.82.020 and repealing Sections 6.82.040, 6.82.080, 6.82.090, 6.82.161, 6.82.170 and 6.82.200 through 6.82.310.
